caption.title: Pathological manifestations in foetuses collected from RVFV infected ewes.
caption.p: Healthy foetuses collected from ewes necropsied at one third (A) or at mid-gestation (B). (C) Foetuses carried by ewe 1764 that succumbed 4 days after inoculation with RVFV in experiment 1. (D) Live foetus collected from an ewe that was necropsied at 4 dpi in experiment 2. (E) Autolytic foetus collected from an ewe necropsied at 6 dpi in experiment 1. (F) Two aborted foetuses from experiment 2 (left) and one foetus (right) that was still inside the uterus at the moment of necropsy.
Click here for additional data file.
